sentence.Network_en: The shock of losing my purse cured me of all my former absentmindedness.
sentence.Network_cn: 失去钱包的打击改掉我以前心不在焉的恶习.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《德伯家的苔丝》第十一章_新沪江英语网... ... luminous 发光的，明亮的 absentmindedness 恍惚 drowsiness 睡意.
佛教电子英语术语索引之三_清心晶光_新浪博客 ... absence of regret 无追悔 absentmindedness 放心 absolute 毕竟.

entry.tran: 漫不经心的;心不在焉的;健忘的
entry.def: Someone who is absent-minded forgets things or does not pay attention to what they are doing, often because they are thinking about something else.

example.ex: In his later life he became even more absent-minded.
example.tran: 他晚年变得愈加健忘了。

means.word_mean: 1. preoccupation so great that the ordinary demands on attention are ignored

auth_sentence.content: Conyers is prone to meandering soliloquies and absentmindedness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Conyers is prone to meandering soliloquies and absentmindedness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Conyers is prone to meandering soliloquies and absentmindedness.
